archimate:Resource.name: Solution Building Block
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB represents the runtime component of ABBs from other layers in the SOA RA. Thus, for example, a Mediation ABB from the Integration Layer runs as a Solution Building Block.

properties.value: This ABB represents the runtime component of ABBs from other layers in the SOA RA. Thus, for example, a Mediation ABB from the Integration Layer runs as a Solution Building Block.
